name: Theatre Tech with YPTMTC
description: Be a part the Young People’s Teen Musical Theatre Company (YPTMTC) in an engaging and hands-on technical theatre crew. Learn how to design and build stage scenery, props, costumes, run stage crew during support the production behind the scenes and during performances. Previous experience is recommended, but not required. For more information about previous and current productions, visit yptmtc.org or email director@yptmtc.org.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
